titles.title: A bill to amend the Act establishing Voyageurs National Park, Minnesota, to allow certain State lease holders of lands within the park to continue to lease such lands for up to twenty years.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.
Referred to Subcommittee on National Parks and Public Lands.

bill.summary: 1/6/1987--Introduced. Amends the Act establishing Voyageurs National Park, Minnesota, to expand from ten to 20 years the time period during which certain State leaseholders may continue to lease Park lands.
